title: Reebok Men's Classic Harman Run Sneaker
description: Reebok Men's Classic Harman Run shoes elevate your everyday style. These joggers for men are designed with a subtle iconic side profile, that carries a strong heritage vibe. You will love the low-cut design of these casual shoes and EVA middlesole for easy, daylong wear. Pair them with jeans or pants to anchor your timeless look. Add these stylish shoes to your footwear rotation for instant throwback style. Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons possible: athletes wanted to run faster. So in the 1890s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first known running shoes with spikes in them. By 1895, he was in business making shoes by hand for top runners; and before long his fledgling company, J.W. Foster and Sons, developed an international clientele of distinguished athletes.
